title: Nested Loops
description: This video looks at loops nested in loops.  What does it mean to have a for loop in the draw() loop?  How do you draw a grid of shapes with two loops?

timestamps.title: Draw Loop is Refreshing the Canvas
For Loop does a Repeated task

codeExamples.title: Nested Loops
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of drawing a grid of shapes using nested loops.
